entries: {@bold {@italic Purpose.}} To oppose the players and serve as an obstacle.
{@bold {@italic Trait.}} I sometimes talk way more than I should.
{@bold {@italic Personality.}} Mocky (Wait, you don't know? Stupid)
{@bold {@italic Source of Attacks.}} Extra arm or leg
{@bold {@italic Extra Abilities.}} Spews liquid fire from mouth. One ear can grow to 61 cm, casting {@spell clairvoyance}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Unzel's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 11}). Unzel can innately cast the following spell, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: Unzel can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fire Spew {@recharge 5}
entries: Unzel spews liquid fire from his mouth. Every creature in a 25-foot cone must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
